alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Clearwater County through 300 PM PDT... At 220 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weippe, or 11 miles northeast of Kamiah. This storm was nearly stationary and has the potential to produce one half inch per hour rainfall rates, resulting in localized runoff issues in and around Weippe. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Weippe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region
